We've worked with the @EnvAgency on a number of projects to tackle the water pollution caused by historical metal mining and more are planned.

If your business has been affected by flooding, please take part in this survey https://t.co/ZqDSlUV4cB

Our second Environment Conference session: 'Win - Win for People and the Environment: Innovative Solutions' is taking place this afternoon 2.30pm-4pm. We will be joined by speakers from @EnvAgency, @SouthWestWater, @JacobsConnects @UniofExeter & @DwrCymru

#ClimateChangeandWater https://t.co/pOz6NBoTm4

It's our online Net Zero Conference today!

We're bringing together government, environmental charities and the private sector to help reach our 2030 #NetZero carbon footprint goal.

We aim to restore habitats like the ones pictured here.
Follow #EACarbonConference for updates. https://t.co/MNg7a3rykc

Thank you to all our brilliant speakers who contributed their experience and insight last night - @joshuabeynon97, Jim Davies from @EnvAgencyMids, @thedancingflea, @DaveTheMayor, @verel94, @BegumLila, Judy from @officialJ4G, Charlotte from @ecobirmingham and @tilbury_laura üåüü§ó

'And who would run that's moderately wise
A certain danger for a doubtful prize'

Check out a wonderful piece by @itvtynetees focusing on our @EnvAgency campaign to help safeguard the future of the rare native white-clawed #crayfish in the River Wansbeck by getting people to ‚Äòcheck ‚Äì clean ‚Äì dry‚Äô to prevent the spread of diseases. Story https://t.co/jGLaNSV0ml https://t.co/l5rSskbk0x
